input.sentences: if i were very rich | i would own my own music store with lots of guitars .
there would be mandolins there | too !
when people came to visit the store | i 'd let them play every instrument .
you know i 'd play a few of them myself but i 'm not a show-off .
that 's what i 'd buy if i were very rich .
output.sentences: At first, the girl in the store was not sure she was rich enough to buy anything there that plays music.
One of the mandolins, however, caught her eye.
Even though she visited the store without any intention to buy, she could still play the instruments.
She tried playing a red, square guitar.
In the end, though, she left empty-handed because she was not rich enough to buy anything at the store.
